original_text: But you must refuse to listen to false stories. Stories like that are not from God and only silly people believe them. Instead, learn to live well in a way that makes God happy.
korean_text: 망령되고 허탄한 신화를 버리고 경건에 이르도록 네 자신을 연단하라

sentences.original_text: But you must refuse to listen to false stories
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 거짓 이야기를 듣는 것을 거절해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Stories like that are not from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 이야기들은 하나님께서 오신 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: and only silly people believe them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 오직 어리석은 사람들만이 그것들을 믿습니다

sentences.original_text: in a way that makes God happy
